description: reviw plugin hooks - commit review reminders and workflow enforcement

hooks.command: bash -c 'if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE "git commit|git push"; then echo "[reviw-plugin] Reminder: Have you run /done and reviewed with reviw before committing?"; fi'

bash -c 'if [ -d ".artifacts" ]; then LATEST=$(ls -td .artifacts/*/ 2>/dev/null | head -1); if [ -n "$LATEST" ] && [ -f "${LATEST}README.md" ]; then STATUS=$(grep -o "ステータス:.*" "${LATEST}README.md" | head -1); if echo "$STATUS" | grep -qE "進行中|レビュー待ち"; then echo "[reviw-plugin] Warning: Task in progress. Consider running /done before stopping."; fi; fi; fi'
